mapper.insert:
select smt_bss_cpc_sftt_sequence.nextval
insert into request_inst_rel (request_inst_rel_id, request_info_id, request_obj_id, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, request_obj_type) values (#{requestInstRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{requestObjId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestObjType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update request_inst_rel set request_info_id = #{requestInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, request_obj_id = #{requestObjId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_obj_type = #{requestObjType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where request_inst_rel_id = #{requestInstRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select request_inst_rel_id, request_info_id, request_obj_id, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, request_obj_type from request_inst_rel where request_inst_rel_id = #{requestInstRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select request_inst_rel_id, request_info_id, request_obj_id, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, request_obj_type from request_inst_rel
